public AbstractShape remove(int index)
Removes a shape to the canvas.

Parameters:

get

public AbstractShape get(int index)
Returns the shape at the specified index.

Parameters:

Returns:

size

public int size()
Gives the size of the canvas.

Returns:
Returns an int with the size of the current canvas array.

getCircles

public java.util.ArrayList<Circle> getCircles()
Gives a list of all of the circles on the canvas.

Returns:
Returns an ArrayList with all of the circles in it, in the order that they appeared on the canvas.

getRectangles

public java.util.ArrayList<Rectangle> getRectangles()
Gives a list of all of the rectangles on the canvas.

Returns:
Returns an ArrayList with all of the rectangles in it, in the order that they appeared on the canvas.

getTriangles

public java.util.ArrayList<Triangle> getTriangles()
Gives a list of all of the triangles on the canvas.

Returns:

getConvexPolygons

public java.util.ArrayList<ConvexPolygon> getConvexPolygons()
Gives a list of all of the convex polygons on the canvas.

Returns:
Returns an ArrayList with all of the convex polygons in it, in the order that they appeared on the canvas.

getShapesByColor

public java.util.ArrayList<AbstractShape> getShapesByColor(java.awt.Color color)
Gives a list of all of the shapes with a specified color on the canvas.

Parameters:
color - The color to be searched for.
Returns:
Returns an ArrayList with all of the shapes that match the specified color.

getAreaOfAllShapes

public double getAreaOfAllShapes()
Gives a sum of all of the areas of the shapes on canvas.

Returns:
Returns a double with the sum of all of the areas of the shapes.
